content: if you re an absolute beginner crocheter this is the easiest little bag to make usually when i teach people to crochet i ll teach them to make a scarf but in the spring and summer that isn t the most ideal project so i came up with this bag project as a cute warm-weather alternative this purse starts out as a simple rectangle which is then folded and seamed up the edges leaving a couple inches for a flap with an optional buttonhole the strap is made separately then sewn on this purse is the easier beginner version of our little purse no 1 pattern 1 **skill level** absolute beginner refer to this page for skill level descriptions 2 **techniques used** chain stitch single_crochet simple seaming weaving in ends **yarn** 110 yards of worsted weight yarn **hook** us j / 6 mm hook **notions** scissors darning/tapestry needle darning/tapestry needle scissors 3/4 button optional **gauge** 3 5 sts & 4 row per inch in single_crochet **measurements** 7 25 wide 6 tall 40 strap can be modified 1 https //cleosyarnshop com/products/little-purse-no-1 2 https //cleosyarnshop com/blogs/learn/whats-your-crochet-skill-level
